title: Sympathetic Dominance Protocol — In Harmony Chiropractic
cleaned_text: Sympathetic Dominance Protocol (SD Protocol) The SD protocol is relatively new, holistic approach to care that is aimed at supporting those who have been under chronic stress. SD certified practitioners use a range of gentle chiropractic adjustments, combined with postural exercises, lifestyle and nutritional advice to specifically support autonomic nervous system function. Patients who may benefit from this approach include those with chronically tight neck and shoulders, frequent headaches, sensitivity to light and/or sound, digestive or hormonal issues, dry skin, chronic inflammation and/or fatigue. Sarah is a certified practitioner in the SD protocol. For more information about the SD protocol, you can read about it here: [https://www.sdprotocol.com/](https://www.sdprotocol.com/) You may also like to listen to this very informative podcast episode with Australian chiropractor, Dr Wayne Todd who developed
